title: Crypto Stocks Advance Pre-Market as Bitcoin Tops $51K, Market Cap Hits 26-Month High
description: Total crypto market cap climbed to $2 trillion for the first time since April 2022.

title: Digitex Futures exchange CEO indicted for violating Bank Secrecy Act
description:
Digitex Futures exchange was ordered to pay $16 million in penalty for failing to register with the CFTC and manipulating the native token price.

A United States federal court has charged Adam Colin Todd — the founder of the Digitex Futures exchange — with violating the Bank Secrecy Act by failing to establish and implement an anti-money laundering program.

The Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) is considered a critical tool in the fight against financial crimes. Establishing an AML program is vital to BSA compliance as it mandates financial institutions to keep records and notify the Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) of certain transactions.

The charges against the futures exchange founder were made public by the United States Attorney’s Office for the Southern District of Florida on Feb. 12. The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) Miami investigated the case, and assistant U.S. Attorney Trevor Jones is the prosecutor.

Read more

title: New Research Challenges Reliability of Common Machine Learning Metric in Link Prediction Tasks
description: Recent research by Professor C. “Sesh” Seshadhri and Nicolas Menand from UC Santa Cruz has questioned the reliability of a widely used metric in evaluating machine learning algorithms for link prediction tasks.  Their findings, published in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, highlight significant mathematical limitations in the commonly employed Area Under Curve […]

title: Bitcoin ETFs boost holdings with 12,073 BTC amid market surge
description: In a significant move that underscores the growing institutional interest in cryptocurrency, Bitcoin ETF in the United States have collectively added over 12,073 Bitcoins to their holdings. title: PlayDapp halts smart contract amid ongoing hack
description: PlayDapp, the South Korean Web3 game development platform and nonfungible token (NFT) marketplace, has temporarily halted its smart contract operations as it grapples with the aftermath of a significant security breach. The company made this decision just before 11:00 am UTC on February 13, as efforts to mitigate the hack’s impact continued into the new […]
